entry.title: https://github.com/CliMA/ClimaAtmos.jl
entry.content: ClimaAtmos.jl is a library for building atmospheric circulation models that is designed from the outset to leverage data assimilation and machine learning tools. We welcome contributions!

entry.title: https://github.com/EnzymeAD/Reactant.jl
entry.content: Optimize Julia Functions With MLIR and XLA for High-Performance Execution on CPU, GPU, TPU and more.

entry.title: https://github.com/FluxML/Flux.jl
entry.content: Relax! Flux is the ML library that doesn't make you tensor

entry.content: A Control Systems Toolbox for Julia

entry.title: https://github.com/NREL-Sienna/PowerFlows.jl
entry.content: Collection of Power Flow solution methods based on PowerSystems.jl

entry.title: https://github.com/NREL-Sienna/PowerGraphics.jl
entry.content: A package to generate visualizations from PowerSimulations.jl results. Part of the Scalable Integrated Infrastructure Planning Initiative at the National Renewable Energy Lab.

entry.title: https://github.com/NREL-Sienna/PowerNetworkMatrices.jl
entry.content: Methods to generate matrix representations of power systems matrices

entry.title: https://github.com/NREL-Sienna/PowerSimulations.jl
entry.content: Julia for optimization simulation and modeling of PowerSystems. Part of the Scalable Integrated Infrastructure Planning Initiative at the National Renewable Energy Lab.

entry.title: https://github.com/NREL-Sienna/PowerSimulationsDynamics.jl
entry.content: Julia package to run Dynamic Power System simulations. Part of the Scalable Integrated Infrastructure Planning Initiative at the National Renewable Energy Lab.

entry.title: https://github.com/NREL-Sienna/PowerSystems.jl
entry.content: Data structures in Julia to enable power systems analysis. Part of the Scalable Integrated Infrastructure Planning Initiative at the National Renewable Energy Lab.
